#grid(columns: (75%, 25%), align(left)[Lavadoras Splash, *Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Consultant*], align(right)[_Jul 2024_]) #grid(columns: (3%, 97%), align(left)[], align(left)[Directed and implemented migration to cloud-based ERP and point of sale for ~30-employee business in Mexico, resulting in multi-fold reduction in manual data entry processes, 100x increase in data volume, SKU alignment across 5 branches, and central interface for procurement, accounting, and inventory.])
#grid(columns: (75%, 25%), align(left)[SLAC Nat'l Accelerator Lab LZ Offline Computing, *Postdoctoral Researcher*], align(right)[_Jul 2024_]) #grid(columns: (3%, 97%), align(left)[], align(left)[Deployed Trino and Superset on kubernetes to visualize LZ metadata with 4-100x query speedups. Validated migration of pulse reconstruction software to new operating system at 1 ppb level. Managed releases for main LZ analysis package and LZ computing environment. Co-coordinated migration of >400k files from >500 users to a Google Shared Drive with 95% success.])
#grid(columns: (75%, 25%), align(left)[Lawrence Livermore Nat'l Lab RED Group, *Graduate Research Assistant*], align(right)[_Jun 2019 - Mar 2024_]) #grid(columns: (3%, 97%), align(left)[], align(left)[Developed novel analysis of low-energy ionization noise in LZ. Designed machineable ceramic components for a dual-phase xenon time projection chamber (TPC) and measured 2x reduction in said noise. Designed and built gas sampling system with 5 ppm sensitivity for a xenon-doped argon test stand.])
